title: Mindfulness & Stress Management
summary:
Mindfulness is a practice that can help balance stress loads.
Too much stress and we can become overwhelmed and anxious, leading to stress related illnesses and burnout.
Globally, stress levels have risen over the norm for many people, with the advent of the COVID-19 pandemic.
Having effective coping mechanisms such as Mindfulness, can help us maintain a healthy stress load.
In this seminar we will explore stress, what it is, how it affects us, why we need it and techniques such as mindfulness, to appropriately balance a healthy stress load, particularly when events create unwanted stress.
paragraphs: Stress is a necessary part of life. Mindfulness is a practice that can help balance stress loads. Too little stress and we can become withdrawn and lethargic. Too much stress and we can become overwhelmed and anxious, leading to stress related illnesses and burnout. It is all a question of balance.

Globally, stress levels have risen over the norm for many people, with the advent of the COVID-19 pandemic. The consequential restrictions imposed on our country and resulting loss of jobs has dramatically affected our economy and way of life, leading many to feel isolated, anxious and fearful. Having effective coping mechanisms such as Mindfulness, can help us maintain a healthy stress load. With the right effort, we can grow stronger and improve our peak working potential.

In this seminar we will explore stress, what it is, how it affects us, why we need it and techniques such as mindfulness, to appropriately balance a healthy stress load, particularly when events create unwanted stress.
